headline: PPL vs. FirstEnergy: Which Utility Is Positioned for Stronger Growth?
summary: PPL and FE are ramping up grid and clean energy investments as data center demand accelerates, reshaping their growth outlook.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider FirstEnergy (FE) After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether FirstEnergy's recent share price puts it on sale or already fully priced, this article will walk through what the current numbers actually say about value. FirstEnergy's share price, at US$50.64, sits against returns of 2.2% over 7 days, 6.6% over 30 days, 11.9% year to date, 36.7% over 1 year, 46.8% over 3 years and 86.9% over 5 years. These figures naturally raise questions about how much of the story is already in the price. Recent coverage around FirstEnergy...

headline: Scotiabank Raises its Price Target on FirstEnergy Corp. (FE) to $56 and Maintains an Outperform Rating
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE:FE) is among the 10 High Growth S&P 500 Stocks to Buy Now. Scotiabank on February 19, 2026, raised its price target on FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE:FE) to $56 from $55 and maintained an Outperform rating. The firm said it remains bullish, highlighting what it described as a “massive” 30% increase to the company’s […]
